answers.answer: Hi there!Though pregnancy could result in increased symptoms due to hormonal changes, stool blockade might not be a good sign and at times could lead to complications. I would suggest an immediate evaluation by your doctor for appropriate management.Hope this helps.Take care!

question: Had anyone ever experienced a blockage while pregnant? I am 31wks and have had a  partial blockage for two weeks. I was put on prednisone and on a liquid diet (also have gestational diabetes). Nothing is helping. If anyone has suggestions they are greatly appreciated.I'm still on Humira and go in for regular iv fluids.
title: Pregnant with a flare
